地址: CALLE 30 NO.2614, ZONA INDUSTRIAL, 44940 GUADALAJARA, JALISCO, MEXICO.

ingredients: ACH DOSE (0.5ML) CONTAINS：AVIBACTERIUM [HAEMOPHILUS] PARAGALLINARUM SEROTYPE A, 083 STRAIN BEFORE INACTIVATED......................................10^8.0 EID50。AVIBACTERIUM [HAEMOPHILUS] PARAGALLINARUM SEROTYPE B, SPROSS STRAIN BEFORE INACTIVATED......................................10^8.0 EID50。 AVIBACTERIUM [HAEMOPHILUS] PARAGALLINARUM SEROTYPE C, MODESTO STRAIN BEFORE INACTIVATED......................................10^8.0 EID50。 NEWCASTLE DISEASE LASOTA STRAIN BEFORE INACTIVATED......10^8.2 EID50。INFECTIOUS BRONCHITIS VIRUS MASS-41 STRAIN BEFORE INACTIVATED.....10^6.7 EID50。
